channel.title: ST*RK Points Control Panel for Flux Forums (intended for EasyRSC)
channel.description:
[b]Compatible with:[/b] EasyRSC (Only), with a FluxBB Forum [b]Download:[/b] http://uppit.com/l0260h6z2d7y/ztools.rar [b]Features:[/b] Highscores, Point Management, Top PKer List, Change Password, Player Search, Administration Panel. (as seen on recently ran Stork Servers) This was originally wrote by me for the kids who became idiots and tried to infect people with script kiddie tools, and I am choosing to release it. Everything is functional and configurable from what I've seen. You set the variables up top in the file to get it running, I also believe you need to make a few changes to the template file (IE, a points=0, variable up top). Any problems or idea's let me know. Enjoy
/* * Copyright (C) 2008-2010 FluxBB * Game related Features coded by sw0o0sh (Sw0o0sh@msn.com) */ session_start(); /* * $server_name * Name of the server */ $server_name = "google.com"; /* * $path_to_players * Full Path to EasyRSC's players folder */ $path_to_players = "/Documents and Settings/Tim/Desktop/EasyRSC/EasyRSC/Server/players/"; /* * $char_extension * Enter the extension of your EasyRSC character files. * This is typically ".cfg" */ $char_extension = ".cfg"; /* * $xp_per_pt * This is the exchange rate of in game XP for each point received. * Each point will give this amount of XP. 307 XP per point is supposedly the default * Stork value. */ $xp_per_pt = 307; /* * $lower_stats * Set this to true if you would like people to be able to lower their stats * in the points manager. */ $lower_stats = true; /* * $ls_gives_points * Set this to true if you would like people to get their points back when * lowering their stats. */ $ls_gives_points = true; /* * $archive_files * Features on Txt-Based servers like highscores and top pkers will not load * at a very speedy rate when the server gets bigger and thousands of player * files are made. Set the below value as true to index these features into * a cache file for fastest display results on the user-end. This will require * an administrator to occasionally index the highscores in the administrator * panel. If set to false, it will be automatic but at the cost of speed. */ $archive_files = true;

@xEnt wrote:

its stupid how people name their servers with stork in it, there was more to why people liked storkpk than just the point thing. It’s the same thing as taking RSCA source and saying “RSCAngel is back!”

on topic gj sw0o0o0o0o0o0o00o0oo0o00o0sh

item.title: ST*RK Points Control Panel for Flux Forums (intended for EasyRSC)
item.dc:creator: @sw0o0sh sw0o0sh
item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

Compatible with: EasyRSC (Only), with a FluxBB Forum
Download: http://uppit.com/l0260h6z2d7y/ztools.rar
Features: Highscores, Point Management, Top PKer List, Change Password, Player Search, Administration Panel. (as seen on recently ran Stork Servers)

This was originally wrote by me for the kids who became idiots and tried to infect people with script kiddie tools, and I am choosing to release it. Everything is functional and configurable from what I’ve seen. You set the variables up top in the file to get it running, I also believe you need to make a few changes to the template file (IE, a points=0, variable up top). Any problems or idea’s let me know. Enjoy

/* * Copyright (C) 2008-2010 FluxBB * Game related Features coded by sw0o0sh (Sw0o0sh@msn.com) */ session_start(); /* * $server_name * Name of the server */ $server_name = "google.com"; /* * $path_to_players * Full Path to EasyRSC's players folder */ $path_to_players = "/Documents and Settings/Tim/Desktop/EasyRSC/EasyRSC/Server/players/"; /* * $char_extension * Enter the extension of your EasyRSC character files. * This is typically ".cfg" */ $char_extension = ".cfg"; /* * $xp_per_pt * This is the exchange rate of in game XP for each point received. * Each point will give this amount of XP. 307 XP per point is supposedly the default * Stork value. */ $xp_per_pt = 307; /* * $lower_stats * Set this to true if you would like people to be able to lower their stats * in the points manager. */ $lower_stats = true; /* * $ls_gives_points * Set this to true if you would like people to get their points back when * lowering their stats. */ $ls_gives_points = true; /* * $archive_files * Features on Txt-Based servers like highscores and top pkers will not load * at a very speedy rate when the server gets bigger and thousands of player * files are made. Set the below value as true to index these features into * a cache file for fastest display results on the user-end. This will require * an administrator to occasionally index the highscores in the administrator * panel. If set to false, it will be automatic but at the cost of speed. */ $archive_files = true;

Read full topic
item.source: ST*RK Points Control Panel for Flux Forums (intended for EasyRSC)
